channel.title: Hey i need help with server ::commands please (read more)
channel.description: hey i want to add really good commands including ::checkbank and also ::checkinventory etc.. and also working ::givemod etc. please could someone help me because my server has no commands in it and when i do ::commands it dont do anything? please someone help and im running off a Hybrid pvp v3 source.

item.title: Hey i need help with server ::commands please (read more)
item.dc:creator: @joelx617 joelx617
item.description:
@joelx617 wrote:

im not a really good coder and do all commands work fine like a command from another server work exactly for what i looking for on my server? and
also like i need help making a ::commands how could i do that? so they could see all normal player and moderator and admin commands.? but not be able to use unless they classified for there role on server?

Read full topic
item.source: Hey i need help with server ::commands please (read more)

item.title: Hey i need help with server ::commands please (read more)
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:2, topic:395054”]None will spoon feed you commands,
Either Rip them from another source,
or try to attempt them on you’re own.[/quote]

Chances are, if you don’t even know where to start. You should probably stop trying to make a server at all. It’s not just a game. It’s a very complex thing. While it’s fun to play. It’s a tough job programming.

And a tip of advice. Don’t ask for help, unless you’ve first tried to help yourself.

Read full topic
